Speaker: Valdmyrun Rhanthunkeana Matrix, Ranthia Transmittance Pattern 2/26/1997 (update: 1/15/1999) The Dream-time Self-Hypnosis Exercise The Monitor Technique The following exercise is formatted for retrieval of memory and information pertaining to phenomena related to experiences of contact and/or abduction by ET or Other-dimensional (OD) Visitors. The format can be adjusted to reflect other areas of interest by substituting the desired area of exploration for the “target” questions during the exercise.
